dropzone.selectFile: Click to select a file or drop it here.

home-page.introduction: Open Foris Collect is the main entry point for data collected in field-based inventories. It provides a fast, easy, flexible way to set up a survey with a user-friendly interface. Collect handles multiple data types and complex validation rules, all in a multilanguage environment.
home-page.survey-not-selected-message: Please select a survey or create a new one from the Survey Designer

export.label: Export

additionalOptions.label: Additional options
additionalOptions.includeKMLColumnForCoordinates: Include KML column for coordinate attributes (for Fusion Tables)*
additionalOptions.includeCompositeAttributeMergedColumn: Include composite attributes merged column (e.g. date, time, coordinate)*
additionalOptions.codeAttributeExpanded: Expand code attributes (add boolean columns for each code value)*
additionalOptions.includeEnumeratedEntities: Include enumerated multiple entities as additional columns
additionalOptions.includeGroupingLabels: Prepend grouping (single entity) name to column name

export.notCompatibleWithCSVDataImportNote: Not compatible with CSV data import

publish.label: Publish
publish.confirmMessage:
Publish the survey "{0}"?
 - data collection could start
 - only few changes to the survey will be allowed in the future.

unpublish.label: Unpublish
unpublish.confirmMessage:
Unpublish the survey "{0}"?
 All the collected records will be deleted.

confirm.title: Delete published survey

The survey "{0}" has been published.

If you delete it, all the records collected with this survey will be deleted.

Do you want to continue?
